name: Magni, Lord of Ironforge
rules: Protector. When this ally is dealt damage by an attacking ally, you may put an [Alliance] ally with cost less than or equal to that attack ally's cost from your hand into play.
flavour: Feel the fury of the mountain!

name: Sylvanas, Lady of Undercity
rules: Long Range (Defenders deal no combat damage to this ally.) When this ally deals fatal damage to a defending ally, you may put target [Horde] ally with cost less than or equal to that defending ally's cost from your graveyard into play.

name: Journey to Astranaar
rules: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Reveal the top two cards of your deck. Put all revealed abilities and equipment in your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

name: Journey to the Crossroads
rules: Pay 5 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card for each different [Horde] race among heroes and allies you control.

name: Message to Freewind Post
rules: Exhaust your hero and pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.

name: Redridge Rendezvous
rules: Pay 5 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card for each different [Alliance] race among heroes and allies you control.

name: Report to Goldshire
rules: If you control more allies than an opponent: Pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.

name: The Defense of Grom'gol
rules: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Reveal the top two cards of your deck. Put all revealed allies in your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

name: Backstab
rules: Your hero deals X melee damage to target exhausted hero or ally, where X is 3 plus the ATK of one of your Daggers.
flavour: In the war between the Horde and the Alliance, grudges are taken to the hilt.

name: Battle Shout
rules: Ongoing: Allies in your party have +1 ATK.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: For Lordaeron! For Khaz Modan! For the Horde! Azeroth has heard them all.

name: Binding Heal
rules: Your hero heals 5 damage from itself and 5 damage from another target hero or ally.

name: Blessing of Protection
rules: Attach to target hero or ally in your party.; Ongoing: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to and dealt by attached character.; At end of turn, destroy Blessing of Protection.

name: Blessing of Wisdom
rules: Attach to target hero or ally.; Ongoing: Attached character has [Exhaust] -> Draw a card.

name: Castigate
rules: Your hero deals 2 unpreventable holy damage to target hero or ally, or 6 if your hero has no damage.
flavour: Purity be necessary for joo to be at one's best, mon. The mojo got da flow clean. - Runetusk

name: Chain Lightning
rules: Target up to three heroes and/or allies. Your hero deals 3, 2, and 1 nature damage to them, respectively.;(received errata)
flavour: The air crackled with electricity as the bolt leapt from body to body, leaving the scent of charred flesh in its wake.

name: Charge
rules: Exhaust target hero or ally.; Draw a card.
flavour: A charge is one of those things that always ends badly for someone.

name: Chastise
rules: Your hero deals 2 holy damage to target hero or ally. That damage can't be prevented.
flavour: You have been judged unworthy. May the Light have pity upon your blackened soul. - Boris Brightbeard

name: Cleanse
rules: Destroy any number of abilities attached to target friendly hero or ally.
flavour: Foul magics, poisons, and diseases all fall before the cleansing Light.

name: Consecration
rules: Your hero deals 2 holy damage to each hero and ally in target player's party. That damage can't be prevented.
reprinted: Through the Dark Portal,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: My church is the field of battle. - Uther Lightbringer

name: Counterspell
rules: Interrupt target ability card.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Assault on Icecrown Citadel,Archive (EA),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Archive
flavour: No voodoo for you, mon. - Ta'zo

name: Coup de Grace
rules: Destroy target exhausted ally.
flavour: Let there never be rest for the weary. - The Assassin's Creed, Chapter 4

name: Curse of Agony
rules: Attach to target hero or ally.; Ongoing: At the start of your turn, put an agony counter on Curse of Agony, then your hero deals 1 shadow damage to attached character for each agony counter on Curse of Agony.

name: Dead Weight
rules: Attach to target ally or equipment.;Ongoing: When attached card exhausts, destroy it.

name: Dismantle
rules: Destroy target equipment.
flavour: With one well-timed strike, any opponent can be stripped of his defenses. - The Assassin's Creed, Chapter 2

name: Dispel Magic
rules: Destroy target ability.
flavour: A fool and her blessings are soon parted.

name: Distract
rules: Exhaust all allies in target player's party. Each of those allies can't ready during its controller's next ready step.
reprinted: Through the Dark Portal,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring)
flavour: Misdirection is the art of making someone see or hear what isn't there.

name: Earth Shock
rules: Your hero deals 4 nature damage to target hero or ally. If you targeted a hero, you may interrupt an ability card played by its controller.
flavour: Concussion beats concentration.

name: Earth's Bounty
rules: Put target card from your graveyard into your hand.
reprinted: March of the Legion,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring)
flavour: The earth speaks to me. It will grant me what I need.

name: Energize
rules: Target player draws two cards.
flavour: A taste of the refreshing energies of the Emerald Dream.

name: Energized
rules: Ready target ally.
flavour: Let's go!

name: Entangling Roots
rules: Attach to target ally and exhaust it.; Ongoing: Attached ally can't ready during its controller's ready step.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Champion Decks
flavour: The vines grew angry, as if every weed of Azeroth sought revenge upon those who would destroy their fertile home.

name: Frost Nova
rules: Your hero deals 1 frost damage to each opposing hero and ally. A character dealt damage this way can't attack this turn.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Assault on Icecrown Citadel,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Champion Decks
flavour: Litori's pursers found themselves quite literally frozen in their tracks.

name: Frost Shock
rules: Your hero deals 2 frost damage to target hero or ally. A character dealt damage this way can't attack or protect this turn.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Heroes of Azeroth (EA),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: There is only one kind of cold the dwarves of Dun Morogh fear.

name: Frostbolt
rules: Your hero deals 3 frost damage to target hero or ally. A character dealt damage this way can't attack this turn.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Assault on Icecrown Citadel,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Champion Decks
flavour: Wearing heavy plate is taxing enough without having to lug around another eighty pounds of ice. - Warrax

name: Greater Heal
rules: Your hero heals 14 damage from target hero or ally.
flavour: As long as you're not dead, you'll be as good as new.

name: Hammer of Justice
rules: Exhaust target hero or ally. It can't ready during its controller's next ready step.; Draw a card.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Assault on Icecrown Citadel,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Archive
flavour: Justice in Azeroth is in short supply, but merciless when it does arrive.

name: Healing Wave
rules: Your hero heals 8 damage from target hero or ally.

name: Hellfire
rules: Your hero deals 5 fire damage to each hero and ally.
reprinted: Through the Dark Portal,Through the Dark Portal (EA)
flavour: Let the fire sear my flesh, so long as it burns my enemies as well.

name: Heroic Strike
rules: Your weapons have +3 ATK this turn.
flavour: A warrior's blade finds its mark as much by will as by skill.

name: Ice Lance
rules: Your hero deals 2 frost damage to target ally, or 6 if that ally is ready.
reprinted: Drums Of War,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Champion Decks
flavour: It's hard to nail a moving target. An immobile one, though…Now that's a different story. - Velindra Sepulchre

name: Immolate
rules: Attach to target hero or ally, and your hero deals 1 fire damage to it.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 fire damage to attached character.
reprinted: Fires of Outland,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)

name: Incinerate
rules: Your hero deals 2 fire damage to target hero or ally, 4 damage if your hero has dealt fire damage with an ability to that character this turn.
reprinted: Fires of Outland,Twilight of the Dragons
flavour: If at first you don't succeed, fry and fry again.

name: Innervate
rules: Target player draws three cards.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Heroes of Azeroth (EA),Champion Decks
flavour: Energy surged through her body like a raging river.

name: Intervene
rules: The next time damage would be dealt to target friendly hero or ally this turn, it's dealt to your hero instead.

name: Kill Command
rules: Target Pet in your party deals melee damage equal to its ATK to target ally.
flavour: In truth, she needs no order to kill. I only tell her whom to spare.

name: Life Tap
rules: As an additional cost to play Life Tap, put 2 damage on your hero.; Draw two cards.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Heroes of Azeroth (EA),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Archive
flavour: When the dark arts cal for flesh, you can only trust your own.

name: Lightning Arc
rules: Your hero deals 3 nature damage divided as you choose to any number of target heroes and/or allies.
flavour: Stand together and face me! - Zaritha

name: Mana Agate
rules: Ongoing: 1, Destroy Mana Agate -> Draw 2 cards.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Champion Decks
flavour: Magi are unique in their ability to store mana for future use without alchemical aid.

name: Mark of the Wild
rules: Attach to target ally.; Ongoing: Attached ally has +2 ATK and +2 health.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: May Cenarius smile upon you. - Archdruid Hamuul Runetotem

name: Melt Face
rules: Target player destroys an ally in his party.
reprinted: Servants of the Betrayer,Servants of the Betrayer (EA),Archive
flavour: Some priests heal; others enhance. I, however, melt faces! - Omedus the Punisher

name: Multi-Shot
rules: Your hero deals 2 ranged damage to each of up to three target heroes and/or allies.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Assault on Icecrown Citadel,Champion Decks

name: Natural Conduit
rules: Your hero deals 3 nature damage to target ally and heals 3 damage from itself.

name: Polymorph
rules: Attach to target ally.; Attached ally can't attack or protect, loses all powers, and is a sheep.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Heroes of Azeroth (EA),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: Baaaaa.

name: Power Word: Fortitude
rules: Attach to target hero or ally.; Ongoing: Attached character has +5 health.
flavour: Spoken aloud, this word turns flesh to iron, doubt to courage.

name: Power Word: Shield
rules: Attach to target hero or ally.; Ongoing: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to attached character. When damage is prevented this way, destroy Power Word: Shield.

name: Prayer of Healing
rules: Your hero heals 3 damage from each hero and ally in your party.

name: Prey on the Weak
rules: Destroy target ally wth cost 4 or less.
reprinted: Through the Dark Portal,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring)
flavour: Rogues don't much care about fair fights.

name: Purge
rules: Destroy target ability unless it's attached to a friendly hero or ally.
flavour: It is as with Mannoroth's blood curse - a spiritual problem requires a spiritual solution.

name: Quickdraw
rules: Your hero deals 2 ranged damage to target ally, or 6 if that ally entered play this turn.

name: Raptor Strike
rules: Your hero deals 3 melee damage to target ally that entered play this turn.

name: Redemption
rules: Put target ally card from your graveyard into play if its cost is less than or equal to the number of resources you have. ; Draw a card.
reprinted: Fires of Outland,Assault on Icecrown Citadel,Fires of Outland (EA),Archive
flavour: The Light conquers even the darkness of death. - Thatia Truthbringer

name: Regrowth
rules: Attach to target hero or ally, and your hero heals 4 damage from it.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero heals 1 damage from attached character.

name: Renew
rules: Attach to target hero or ally.; Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero heals 1 damage from attached character.
flavour: The warrior's wounds closed as quickly as they appeared.

name: Resurrection
rules: Put target ally card from your graveyard into play if its cost is less than or equal to the number of resources you have.
flavour: May your second chance end better than your first.

name: Righteous Vengeance
rules: Destroy target attacking ally.
flavour: Retribution comes swiftly for the wicked.

name: Scorch
rules: Your hero deals 1 fire damage to target hero or ally.
reprinted: Through the Dark Portal,Assault on Icecrown Citadel,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Through the Dark Portal (EA)
flavour: All magi are pyromaniacs...at least a little bit.

name: Sear
rules: Your hero deals 2 fire damage to target ally, or 6 if that ally was dealt damage this turn.
reprinted: Blood Of Gladiators,Assault on Icecrown Citadel

name: Serpent Sting
rules: Attach to target hero or ally.; Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 nature damage to attached character, or 2 if you have a Ranged weapon.
flavour: Laced with poisonous toxins, the serpent sting burns the very blood of its target.

name: Shadow Bolt
rules: Your hero deals 3 shadow damage to target hero or ally.;When that character is destroyed this turn, its controller discards a card.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Heroes of Azeroth (EA),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Archive
flavour: May darkness take you, for when I'm done, the Light will not recognize you. - Radak Doombringer

name: Sinister Strike
rules: Your hero deals X melee damage to target hero or ally, where X is 1 plus the ATK of one of your Melee weapons.
flavour: Is adds injury to insult.

name: Slay the Feeble
rules: Your hero deals 3 melee damage to target exhausted hero or ally.
flavour: If a rogue is present, it's never a fair fight.

name: Soul Inversion
rules: Attach to target ally.; Ongoing: Attached ally has +2 ATK / -2 health.
flavour: There's always a cost for power - you just have to decide whether or not you can afford it. - Forang Deathrattle

name: Soulstone
rules: Attach to target ally.;Ongoing: When attached ally is destroyed, its owner may put it from his graveyard into play.

name: Starfire
rules: Your hero deals 5 arcane damage to target hero or ally.; Draw a card.
flavour: The very heavens echoed the druid's rage and opened up at his command.

name: Starshot
rules: Your hero deals 3 arcane damage to target ally.; Draw a card.

name: Steal Essence
rules: Your hero deals 2 shadow damage to target hero or ally and heals 1 damage from itself for each damage dealt.
flavour: Tonight, I'll drink to your health - may it long be mine.

name: Taunt
rules: Attach to target hero or ally.;Ongoing: Attached character must attack if able and can attack only your hero if able.
flavour: Your mother was a furbolg and your father smells of elekk turd! - Blaine Roberts

name: The Natural Order
rules: Destroy target ability or equipment.
reprinted: Servants of the Betrayer,Servants of the Betrayer (EA),Archive
flavour: It is nature's will to provide balance.

name: Thunder Clap
rules: Your hero deals 1 melee damage to each opposing hero and ally. A character dealt damage this way has -1 ATK this turn.
reprinted: Through the Dark Portal,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring)

name: Trophy Kill
rules: Destroy target ally with cost 4 or more.
reprinted: Through the Dark Portal,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring)
flavour: Hunters pride themselves on felling the most dangerous beasts.

name: Vindictive Strike
rules: Your hero deals 2 unpreventable holy damage to target ally, or 6 if that ally dealt damage this turn.

name: Whirlwind
rules: Your hero deals melee damage to each opposing ally equal the ATK of one of your Melee weapons.
reprinted: Servants of the Betrayer,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring)
flavour: All men enter, no men leave.

name: Acid Hands McGillicutty
rules: When Acid Hands is destroyed, you may destroy target equipment.
reprinted: March of the Legion,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)

name: Alamira Grovetender
rules: Nature Resistance (Prevent all nature [Nature] damage that this ally would be dealt.)
flavour: Nature will not harm me. I am its defender.

name: Alecia Hall
rules: When Alecia enters play, she heals 3 damage from target hero or ally.
reprinted: Hunt For Illidan,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: It appears I have arrived with time to spare.

name: Anduros Silversong
rules: This ally can't attack heroes.

name: Angrida
rules: [Exhaust] -> Angrida deals 2 shadow damage to target ally.
flavour: Don't touch what you can't afford.

name: Anika Berlyn
flavour: Most paladins would gladly live and die as Uther did.

name: Apprentice Teep
rules: Elusive (Can't be Attacked)
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Heroes of Azeroth (EA),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Archive

name: Araelun
flavour: The Blood Knights of Silvermoon are the backbone of the blood elf army.

name: Batter Brains McGillicutty
rules: When Batter Brains is destroyed, target player discards a card.
flavour: What's the matter? Can't think straight?

name: Benethor Draigo
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: In life he cooked meat for his brothers. In death he cooked his brothers for meat.

name: Besora Galefeather
rules: Assault 2 (+2 ATK on your turn)

name: Bizzazz
rules: When Bizzazz enters play, draw a card.
reprinted: March of the Legion,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring)

name: Bloodblade
rules: Bloodblade can attack only heroes.
reprinted: March of the Legion,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring)

name: Bloodclaw
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Heroes of Azeroth (EA),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring)
flavour: The eyes of a raptor reveal a feral, vicious intelligence at work.

name: Bloodsoul
rules: Bloodsoul can attack only heroes.
flavour: Doom comes for you, and it takes pleasure in your resistance.

name: Boum Headshot
rules: Ferocity (Can attack immediately.)
flavour: These reflexes and this gun have saved my hide more than once.

name: Braxiss the Sleeper
rules: Elusive
flavour: I'm awake. I'm awake.

name: Captain Swash
rules: Swash has +3 ATK while attacking an exhausted hero or ally.
reprinted: March of the Legion,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring)
flavour: 'Dashing' isn't a word I'd use to describe an orc - unless he were running. - Kintara Wintermoon

name: Cerwyn
reprinted: Through the Dark Portal,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring)
flavour: Evey blade of grass in the Emerald Dream holds a lesson. I could spend an eternity there and still have more to learn.

name: Confessor Mildred
rules: 2, Destroy Confessor Mildred -> Destroy target ability.
flavour: Confess your sins so that I may strip them from your flesh.

name: Dawn Ravensdale
rules: When Dawn enters play, you may turn target face-down hero face up.
flavour: Do not let doubt assail you. You are far stronger than you realize.

name: Drusenna the Vigilant
rules: Protector

name: Firewarden Wyland Kaslinth
rules: Assault 1 (+1 ATK on your turn)

name: Fungus Face McGillicutty
rules: When Fungus Face is destroyed, you may destroy target ability.
reprinted: March of the Legion,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring)
flavour: Death hasn't robbed the Forsaken of the ability to understand what you say. They're just not likely to listen.

name: Gareth Ironshot
rules: Long Range (Defenders deal no combat damage to this character.)

name: Gartok Skullsplitter
rules: When Gartok Skullsplitter attacks, you may exhaust target armor.

name: Gregory Flamewaker
rules: Assault 3 (+3 ATK on your turn)

name: Guruvan
rules: Long-Range (Defenders deal no combat damage to this character.)
flavour: May the naaru guide my aim.

name: Gurzuk
rules: Ferocity (Can attack immediately.)
reprinted: March of the Legion,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),March of the Legion (EA)

name: Hailey Goodchilde
rules: [Exhaust] -> Hailey Goodchilde heals all damage from target ally.
flavour: Following in her father's footsteps, Hailey seeks to restore Stormwind to its former glory.

name: Hannah the Unstoppable
rules: Opposing heroes and allies can't protect.
flavour: You'll eventually gather your wits, but nothing will save your gold.

name: Horatio Plaguetouch
rules: Assault 2 (+2 ATK on your turn)

name: Huro'shal Gutwrench
rules: When this ally is dealt damage, you may destroy target ability.
flavour: Smash, smash, smash - dis be too much fun.

name: Jewelcrafter Zanaz
flavour: We who are exiled must forever keep our faith.

name: Jonas Targan
rules: [Exhaust] -> Jonas deals 1 melee damage to target damaged hero or ally.

name: Kagra of the Crossroads
rules: Ferocity (Can attack immediately)
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)

name: Karkas Deathhowl
rules: When Karkas Deathhowl enters play, you may put target ally into its owner's hand.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)

name: Karrok Scarrend
flavour: The more, the merrier - Scarrend family motto

name: Kelvor Valorshine
rules: Combat damage dealt by Kelvor Valorshine can't be prevented.
flavour: Power is never deserved; it is taken by those who want it.

name: Kinivus
rules: Shadow Resistance (Prevent all shadow or [Shadow] damage that this ally would be dealt.)
flavour: Though he has not turned his back on the Light, he hears the call of the elements more clearly.

name: Kor Cindervein
flavour: By my beard, those who forge their own blessings need never beg for them.

name: Kurao Stormheart
rules: When this ally readies, he may deal 1 melee damage to target ally.

name: Lady Courtney Noel
rules: [Exhaust] -> Lady Courtney Noel heals 1 damage from each hero and ally in your party.
flavour: If I cannot save Azeroth, I will keep safe those who can.

name: Lafiel
rules: 2, [Exhaust] -> Destroy target ability.
flavour: Even the grace of Elune cannot keep all her daughters from the shadow.

name: Latro Abiectus
rules: Elusive (Can't be Attacked)
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Heroes of Azeroth (EA),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: I am morally certain you have made a critical error in judgment, orc.

name: Liba Wobblebonk
rules: When Liba Wobblebonk enters play, draw a card.

name: Mias the Putrid
rules: When Mias enters play, target player discards a card.
flavour: Never has putrescence looked to inviting.

name: Milo the Unmerciful
rules: [Exhaust] -> Exhaust target armor.

name: Moira Darkheart
rules: 1, Destroy Moira Darkheart -> Destroy target armor or weapon.
flavour: Her looks can be disarming.

name: Moko Hunts-at-Dawn
rules: Ferocity (Can attack immediately.)
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: The early hunter catches the bird catching the worm.

name: Morfiel
rules: Opponents pay 1 more to play abilities.
reprinted: Through the Dark Portal,Through the Dark Portal (EA)
flavour: Felhunters feed on magical energies...and those who wield them.

name: Olaf Steelbreaker
rules: Protector

name: Old Bones
rules: Old Bones can protect your hero.
flavour: Let sleeping bears lie.

name: Orion
rules: Protector
flavour: Taste blessed steel, cur!

name: Orono the Great
reprinted: Drums Of War Starter,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring)
flavour: The spark of fire and the chill of frost.

name: Parren Shadowshot
rules: 1, [Exhaust] -> Target hero or ally has Long-Range this turn. (Defenders deal no combat damage to it.)

name: Petreus Roffe
rules: Protector

name: Priestess Katianna
rules: Elusive (Can't be attacked.)
reprinted: Drums Of War Starter,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring)
flavour: Perhaps you should jump at shadows.

name: Randipan
rules: When Randipan deals combat damage to a defending hero, draw a card.
flavour: The fastest way to an orc's heart is between the third and fourth ribs.

name: Rayne Savageboon
rules: Protector;Nature Resistance (Prevent all nature or [Nature] damage that this ally would be dealt.)
flavour: You've picked the wrong night elf to mess with.

name: Ra'za WildStorm
flavour: Greetings, mon. It's nice to beat ya.

name: Raztu'jor
rules: When this ally attacks, you may destroy target weapon.

name: Rodrigo
flavour: When it comes to the world of combat, Rodrigo leads the way.

name: Routeen
rules: [Exhaust] -> Routeen deals 1 fire damage to target hero or ally that was dealt damage this turn.

name: Sarmoth
rules: Opposing heroes and allies that can attack Sarmoth can attack only Sarmoth.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Archive
flavour: Voidwalkers do not fear pain, so they are popular with warlocks who do.

name: Scaramanga
rules: 2, Destroy Scaramanga -> Draw a card.
reprinted: Through the Dark Portal,Through the Dark Portal (EA),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: Ours is the loneliest profession.

name: Scout Omerrta
rules: Protector
reprinted: Through the Dark Portal,Through the Dark Portal (EA)
flavour: Stay here while I check out the path ahead.

name: Scrapper Ironbane
rules: At the end of your turn, you may destroy target equipment.
flavour: That's for my brother!

name: Shadow
rules: Elusive; (Can't be attacked.)
flavour: Joo don't want ta hear de cat's purr, mon. Joo won't never hear nothin' again. - Warmaster Bo'jo

name: Shadowfiend
rules: Ferocity;When Shadowfiend deals combat damage to a hero, ready one of your resources.;At the end of your turn, put Shadowfiend into its owner's hand.

rules: Elusive (Can't be attacked.)

name: Sister Rot
rules: When Sister Rot enters play, you may destroy target ability.

name: Skronk Skullseeker
rules: Skronk has +3 ATK while attacking an exhausted hero or ally.
flavour: One man's skull is this orc's trophy.

name: Taz'dingo
rules: When Taz'Dingo enters play, he deals 1 ranged damage to target hero or ally.

rules: Protector

name: Valanos
reprinted: Through the Dark Portal,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring)

name: Vanda Skydaughter
reprinted: Through the Dark Portal,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: Nature isn't just around you. It's above you as well.

name: Varah, Fury of the Stars
rules: Assault 2 (+2 ATK on your turn)

rules: Ferocity (Can attack immediately)

name: Vesperia Silversong
rules: This ally can't attack heroes.

rules: Protector

flavour: Spirits of this land, hear my call!

name: Waz'luk
rules: When Waz'luk enters play, he deals 1 fire damage to target hero.
reprinted: Through the Dark Portal,Archive (EA),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Champion Decks,Archive
flavour: He makes quite a first impression.

name: Zari'zari
rules: Berserking (+1 ATK for each damage.)
flavour: Don't make me angry. Joo wouldn't like me when I'm angry.

name: Zi'mo
rules: Berserking (+1 ATK for each damage.)
flavour: The Darkspear thrive under pressure.

name: Zygore Bladebreaker
rules: When Zygore Bladebreaker enters play, you may destroy target armor or weapon.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Heroes of Azeroth (EA),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring)

name: Ancient Bone Bow
rules: When you strike with Ancient Bone Bow, your hero has Long-Range this combat. (Defenders deal no combat damage to it.)
flavour: Handed down from ancestor to ancestor, this bow has seen many enemies fall before it.

name: Annihilator
rules: Combat damage dealt by your hero with Annihilator can't be prevented.

name: Arcanite Reaper
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Heroes of Azeroth (EA),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring)
flavour: The arcanite reaper was long the mark of a true warrior in Azeroth. Having one crafted was like a rite of passage.

name: Barman Shanker
rules: Barman Shanker has +2 ATK while your hero is attacking an exhausted hero or ally.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: Property of the Grim Guzzler Tavern.

name: Blackcrow
rules: When you strike with Blackcrow, your hero has Long-Range this combat. (Defenders deal on combat damage to it.)
reprinted: Through the Dark Portal,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Champion Decks
flavour: This crossbow was once a weapon of the shadow hunter Vosh'gajin

name: Bloodbane's Fall
rules: Your hero has Assault 1. (+1 ATK on your turn.)
reprinted: ScourgeWar,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Champion Decks

name: Bonefist Gauntlets
rules: [Exhaust] -> You pay 2 less the next time you strike with a weapon this turn.

name: Crimson Shocker
rules: When Crimson Shocker enters play, your hero may deal 2 fire damage to target hero or ally.
reprinted: March of the Legion,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: The heat of the Molten Core shimmers inside the wand's glowing tip.

name: Draconian Deflector
rules: Your hero has Protector.

name: Fel Iron Hatchet
reprinted: Through the Dark Portal,Through the Dark Portal (EA),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: Even the metals of Outland carry with them the taint of the Burning Legion.

name: Golem Skull Helm
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: A trophy from the golem Panzer, bouncer for the Grim Guzzler.

name: Heartseeker
rules: Heartseeker has +2 ATK while your hero is attacking a hero or ally that was dealt damage this turn.

name: King's Defender
rules: Your hero is a Protector.

name: Ornate Adamantium Breastplate
flavour: Its craftsmanship is beyond compare.

name: Perdition's Blade
rules: When Perdition's Blade enters play, your hero deals 1 fire damage to target hero or ally.

name: Rhok'delar, Longbow of the Ancient Keepers
rules: When you strike with Rhok'delar, your hero has Long-Range this combat.

name: Scarlet Kris
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: Its secret is that the blood of its victims keeps the scarlet color bright.

name: Scimitar of the Nexus Stalkers
flavour: It is swift and surprising, like the ethereals for which it is named.

name: Slayer's Waistguard
rules: You pay 3 less to strike with weapons while your hero is defending.

name: Wand of Eternal Light
rules: Damage that would be dealt with Wand of Eternal Light is unpreventable.

name: Bonewall Simms
rules: 2, Flip Bonewall -> Target hero or ally is a Protector this turn.

name: Chaigon Steelsight
rules: 1, Flip Chaigon -> Target ally has -3 ATK this turn.

name: Fillet, Kneecapper Extraordinaire
rules: 3, Flip Fillet -> Allies in your party have +1 ATK this turn.
flavour: My size is a disadvantage, eh? Do you think the enemy stands on their arms or something?

name: Forang Deathrattle
rules: 3, Flip Forang -> Forang deals 2 shadow damage to target hero or ally and heals 1 damage from himself for each damage dealt this way. Use only on your turn.

name: Graccus
rules: 3, Flip Graccus -> Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target hero or ally this turn.
flavour: The greatest battles are won not by strength of arm, but strength of will.

name: Grennan Stormspeaker
rules: 5, Flip Grennan Stormspeaker -> Grennan deals 3 nature damage to target hero or ally and heals 3 damage from target hero or ally. Use only on your turn.
flavour: The sky itself trembles at his call.

name: Hekto Starspire
rules: 4, Flip Hekto -> Destroy target attacking ally.

name: Joren the Martyr
rules: 2, Flip Joren -> The next time target hero or ally would be dealt damage this turn, prevent it.
flavour: Judge me not by my bones. My soul has a strength you cannot fathom.

name: Kintara Wintermoon
rules: 3, Flip Kintara -> Target player puts an ally from his party into its owner's hand. Use only on your turn.

name: Marlowe Christophers
rules: 6, Flip Marlowe -> Target hero or ally has -5 health this turn. Use only on your turn.
flavour: The curse's effect is only temporary. Your death will not be.

name: Morova of the Sands
rules: 10, Flip Morova -> Morova deals 7 nature damage to target hero or ally.
flavour: The Cenarion Circle will not be content until balance has been restored to the land.

name: Mythen of the Wild
rules: 2, Flip Mythen -> Mythen heals 2 damage from target hero or ally for each quest you have.
flavour: Naralex hoped to revitalize the Barrens. If only he hadn't become trapped in a nightmare!

name: Ravenna
rules: Flip Ravenna -> Target ally in your party has Stealth this turn.
flavour: That's the thing about odds - they're always changing.

name: Sen'zir Beastwalker
rules: 3, Flip Sen'zir Beastwalker -> Put a Pet card from your graveyard into your hand.
flavour: Vicious and cunning; like hunter, like pet.

name: Ta'zo
rules: 3, Flip Ta'zo -> Ta'zo deals 3 fire damage to target hero or ally. Use only on your turn.
flavour: You play wit da fire, mon, you gonna get da burn!

name: Timmo Shadestep
rules: 5, Flip Timmo Shadestep -> Destroy target exhausted ally. Use only on your turn.
flavour: The ability to hide in half a shadow makes gnomes among Azeroth's deadliest assassins.

name: Zaritha
rules: 2, Flip Zaritha -> Zaritha heals 5 damage from target hero or ally.
flavour: I beseech the wind and sky - heed me now and hear my cry!

name: Bane of the Illidari
rules: If you have an equipment, pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: The time has come to forge the sword. - David Wayne

name: Dr. Boom!
rules: Pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Reveal the top card of your deck, put damage on your hero equal to its cost, then put it into hand.
reprinted: Servants of the Betrayer,Servants of the Betrayer (EA)
flavour: My former protege, Sparky Uberthruster, wouldn't wear his helmet while down here and one day transformed into the infamous Dr. Boom! - Lead Sapper Blastfizzle

name: Gahz'ridian
rules: Pay 5 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw two cards.
flavour: I even invented a detector that makes finding the Gahz'ridian a snap! Just put it on, and the search begins! - Marvon Rivetseeker

name: Tabards of the Illidari
rules: If an ally is in your party, pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: These will do quite nicely. - Kor'kron Wind Rider

name: The Fel and the Furious
rules: If your hero has more damage than an opposing hero, pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: Whatever you do, don't forget to destroy as much as you can! - Plexi

name: The Path of Conquest
rules: If no opposing allies are in play, pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: Indeed, these troublesome whelps are up to something insidious. - Kor'kron Wind Rider

name: The Unending Invasion
rules: Pay 4 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card, then draw another one for each 10 damage on your hero.
flavour: Beings of pure mana began streaming into the village from all over the area. For now, we're containing them as we can... - Lieutenant-Sorcerer Morran

name: Wanted: Durn the Hungerer
rules: If an opposing ally was destroyed this turn, pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: Durn's murderous grip has been loosed! Nagrand has a brighter tomorrow because of you, hero. Well done! - Warden Bullrok

name: You Are Rakh'likh, Demon
rules: Pay 4 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card, or two cards if a Demon is in your party.
flavour: Should you defeat the Defiler, bring back his horn. It will become a symbol of hope for all that view it - proof that heroes do exist in this war-torn world. - Fallen Hero of the Horde

name: Your Fortune Awaits You
rules: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: Fortune favors the bold.

name: Zapped Giants
rules: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put revealed ability card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
flavour: I'm going to have to do something about the giants if I stay out here! - Zorbin Fandazzle

name: Shadow Word: Death
rules: Your hero deals 3 shadow damage to target hero or ally. Then, if that character doesn't have fatal damage, put 3 damage on your hero.
reprinted: Through the Dark Portal,War of the Elements,Archive
flavour: As words go, it's frequently the last.

name: Loraala the Frigid
rules: 2, Flip Loraala -> Loraala deals 3 frost damage to target hero. A hero dealt damage this way can't attack this turn.

name: Healing Touch
rules: Your hero heals 10 damage from target hero or ally.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,War of the Elements
flavour: In time, nature will heal all wounds. - Arturius Hathrow

name: Wrath
rules: Your hero deals 3 nature damage to target hero or ally.
reprinted: Through the Dark Portal,Worldbreaker,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Archive
flavour: Dis new world gonna take some gettin' used to, bruddah. - Jumo'zin

name: Arcane Shot
rules: Your hero deals 1 arcane damage to target hero or ally. Draw a card.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,War of the Elements,Assault on Icecrown Citadel,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Champion Decks

name: Arcane Missiles
rules: Your hero deals X arcane damage to target hero or ally. X can't be more than 5.
reprinted: Through the Dark Portal,War of the Elements,Through the Dark Portal (EA)
flavour: Use the right tool for the job. - Jinxy Blastwheel

name: Fire Blast
rules: Your hero deals 2 fire damage to target hero or ally.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Worldbreaker,Assault on Icecrown Citadel,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Archive

name: Fireball
rules: Attach to target hero or ally, and your hero deals 4 fire damage to it.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 fire damage to attached character.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Twilight of the Dragons,Assault on Icecrown Citadel,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)

name: Holy Light
rules: Your hero heals 5 damage from target hero or ally. Draw a card.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Worldbreaker,Assault on Icecrown Citadel,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)

name: Flash Heal
rules: Your hero heals 4 damage from target hero or ally.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Worldbreaker,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: It will take all we have to heal those who fell victim to the destruction caused by Deathwing. - Tilly Fiddlelight.

name: Gouge
rules: Exhaust target hero or ally. It can't ready during its controller's next ready step.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Worldbreaker,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: Every being has vulnerable spots; make it your business to know them all. -The assassin's Creed, Chapter 2

name: Sap
rules: Attach to target hero or ally and exhaust it.;Ongoing: Attached character can't ready during its controller's ready step.;When attached character is dealt damage, destroy this ability.
reprinted: Hunt For Illidan,War of the Elements

name: Chain Heal
rules: Target up to three heroes and/or allies. Your hero heals 3, 2, and 1 damage from them, respectively.
reprinted: Fires of Outland,War of the Elements,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)

name: Lightning Bolt
rules: Your hero deals 4 nature damage to target hero or ally.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Worldbreaker,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall)
flavour: Shamans know that lightning can strike twice in the same place.

name: Fear
rules: Put target opposing ally into its owner's hand.
flavour: It fled without a wordâ€¦unless AAAAAGH! counts as a word.

name: Execute
rules: Destroy target ally with damage on it.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Worldbreaker,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Champion Decks
flavour: Showing weakness to a warrior is a death sentence.

name: Intercept
rules: Exhaust target hero or ally, and your hero deals 1 melee damage to it.
reprinted: Through the Dark Portal,War of the Elements,Through the Dark Portal (EA)
flavour: Knock 'em down, then finish 'em off. - Fraznak the Furious
